snippet.title: Open Surge SAGE 2019 Trailer
snippet.description: It's coming this month! Open Surge 0.5.0 trailer for #sagexpo 2019. Open Surge is a fun 2D retro platformer inspired by old-school Sonic games. It is also a game creation system that makes you a powerful creator! Play, hack, create games and unleash your creativity! https://opensurge2d.org Music Sunshine Paradise composed by Victor Seven https://twitter.com/Victor_Seven7 #SAGE2019
